trans-unit.source: Checks if a string contains only hexadecimal digit (0-9, A-F) characters.

seg-source.mrk: Checks if a string contains only hexadecimal digit (0-9, A-F) characters.

target.mrk: Checks if a string contains only hexadecimal digit (0-9, A-F) characters.

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: The string to check

seg-source.mrk: The string to check

target.mrk: The string to check

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: 0 if string contains non-hexadecimal characters.

seg-source.mrk: 0 if string contains non-hexadecimal characters.

target.mrk: 0 if string contains non-hexadecimal characters.

trans-unit.source: Remarks

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: Valid characters are 0123456789abcdefABCDEF.

seg-source.mrk: Valid characters are 0123456789abcdefABCDEF.

target.mrk: Valid characters are 0123456789abcdefABCDEF.

trans-unit.source: Note that a string containing whitespace or the "0x" prefix will cause StringIsXDigit() to return 0.

seg-source.mrk: Note that a string containing whitespace or the "0x" prefix will cause StringIsXDigit() to return 0.

target.mrk: Note that a string containing whitespace or the "0x" prefix will cause StringIsXDigit() to return 0.
